scripts.migrate-latest:prod: NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex migrate:latest
scripts.migrate-rollback:prod: NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a offthewall-teamslick) knex migrate:rollback
scripts.seed:prod: NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a offthewall-teamslick) knex seed:run
scripts.seed:staging: NODE_ENV=production DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a damp-earth-59669) knex seed:run
